org.apache.taverna.download

Interface DownloadManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DownloadManagerImpl

    public interface DownloadManager
    Download Manager for handling file download and checking the integrity of the download.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void download(URI source, Path destination)
      Downloads a file from a URL.
      void download(URI source, Path destination, String digestAlgorithm)
      Downloads a file from a URL and checks the integrity of the download by downloading and verifying the a checksum using the specified algorithm.
      void download(URI source, Path destination, String digestAlgorithm, URI digestSource)
      Downloads a file from a URL and checks the integrity of the download by downloading and verifying the a checksum using the specified algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • download

        void download(URI source,
              Path destination)
       throws DownloadException
        Downloads a file from a URL.

        The destination file will be created if it does not exist. If it does exist it will be overwritten.

        Parameters:
        source - the file to download
        destination - the file to write to
        Throws:
        DownloadException - if
        • the source does not exist
        • the source cannot be downloaded
        • the destination is not a file
        • the destination cannot be written to

      • download

        void download(URI source,
              Path destination,
              String digestAlgorithm)
       throws DownloadException
        Downloads a file from a URL and checks the integrity of the download by downloading and verifying the a checksum using the specified algorithm.

        Every implementation is required to support the following standard algorithms:

        • MD5
        • SHA-1
        • SHA-256

        The checksum source will be calculated by appending the algorithm name to the source. e.g. for an MD5 algorithm and a source of http://www.example.com/test.xml the checksum will be downloaded from http://www.example.com/test.xml.md5

        Parameters:
        source - the file to download
        destination - the file to write to
        digestAlgorithm - the digest algorithm to use
        Throws:
        DownloadException - if
        • the source does not exist
        • the digest source does not exist
        • the source cannot be downloaded
        • the destination cannot be written to
        • the destination is not a file
        • the checksums do no match

      • download

        void download(URI source,
              Path destination,
              String digestAlgorithm,
              URI digestSource)
       throws DownloadException
        Downloads a file from a URL and checks the integrity of the download by downloading and verifying the a checksum using the specified algorithm.

        Every implementation is required to support the following standard algorithms:

        • MD5
        • SHA-1
        • SHA-256

        Parameters:
        source - the file to download
        destination - the file to write to
        digestAlgorithm - the digest algorithm to use
        digestSource - the digest file to check
        Throws:
        DownloadException - if
        • the source does not exist
        • the digest source does not exist
        • the source cannot be downloaded
        • the destination cannot be written to
        • the destination is not a file
        • the digestSource does not exist
        • the checksums do no match
